document.full_text: china said it hoped the united states will take effective steps to improve its fiscal position, in beijing's latest expression of concern about the possibility that washington could briefly default on debt.
document.title: china says hopes u.s. will take "effective" debt steps
lines_and_colors: china said it hoped the united states will take effective steps to improve its fiscal position, in beijing's latest expression of concern about the possibility that washington could briefly default on debt.
